video.title: La Patrona
video.synopsis: Ambitious, sultry Antonia Guerra becomes the most powerful person in town when her mine owner husband dies after walking in on her and another man.

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela Suárez exposes safety issues at the San Pedro mine. Gabriela and Alejandro’s lives change after they’re trapped in a mine collapse together.
episodes.title: Gran Estreno

episodes.synopsis: Tomás confesses to Francisca that he found a huge vein of gold, but he’s desperate to get his hands on Gabriela’s mother Lucía’s will.
episodes.title: Atrapados

episodes.synopsis: Tomás quits the San Pedro mine, but not before firing Gabriela. Antonia suspects Tomás stole gold from her. Macario follows him to El Chamuco.
episodes.title: Despedida

episodes.synopsis: Fernando dreams that Antonia kills his father. Francisca tells Gabriela Tigre went to El Chamuco. Gabriela runs into Antonia in a tense encounter.
episodes.title: De cacería

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela confronts Antonia. David takes Maximiliano to his grandmother Lucía’s grave to hide the gold. Alejandro warns Antonia not to turn Tigre in.
episodes.title: Juego de seducción

episodes.synopsis: Alberto proposes to Antonia. Alberto Espino and Patricia are in the stables about to make love. Fernando confesses that he raped Gabriela Suárez.
episodes.title: Defensa por amor

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela rejects Alejandro’s kiss and runs. Antonia tells Fernando never to tell anyone he raped Gabriela. Antonia suspects David may be her grandson.
episodes.title: Compromiso

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela makes a difficult confession to Alejandro about David’s origins. Alejandro announces his wedding plans. Alberto tells Antonia about the gold.
episodes.title: Noche de amor

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro is furious with Aníbal after he tells him to enjoy his affair with Gabriela. A lock of David’s hair is stolen for a DNA test with Fernando.
episodes.title: Planes de huída

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal and Justo force Diego, the lawyer, to tell them everything he knows about Tigre and El Chamuco. Antonia announces her son’s engagement.
episodes.title: Manipulación

episodes.synopsis: Antonia announces Alejandro and Gabriela’s wedding. Lagarto tries to rape Inocencia, but it doesn’t go as planned. David goes up the bell tower.
episodes.title: Acorralada

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela promises to kill anyone who dares hurt her family again. Alejandro protects her and takes her off the platform. Antonia threatens the miners.
episodes.title: Una gran mentira

episodes.synopsis: Gastón refuses to sign the confession to Inocencia’s murder. Tigre testifies in Gastón’s favor. Antonia shows Alejandro the results of the DNA test.
episodes.title: Cizaña

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela goes to report her rape to the police, but she’s furious when Ricardo tells her it won’t help. Macario gives Antonia the gun Julia had.
episodes.title: Planes de huída

episodes.synopsis: David finds out Fernando is his father. Alejandro is worried when David goes missing. Gabriela threatens to accuse Fernando if Tigre is arrested.
episodes.title: Sed de Venganza

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela and Antonia get in a big fight. The Tigre is arrested. Gabriela goes to report her rape to the police, but Ricardo says she has no case.
episodes.title: Denuncia

episodes.synopsis: Fernando apologizes to Gabriela. Alejandro confirms Gabriela was raped, and she refuses to forgive Fernando. Aníbal convinces Antonia to let Tigre go.
episodes.title: Sentenciados

episodes.synopsis: Tigre is tortured to reveal the location of the gold. Antonia and Prudencia blame Gabriela for Julia’s death. Antonia wants Tigre and Gabriela dead.
episodes.title: Crímenes

episodes.synopsis: Antonia and Fernando duke it out. Alejandro tries to keep Gastón out of jail, but it doesn’t look good. Aníbal tries to take advantage of Gabriela.
episodes.title: Explosión

episodes.synopsis: The explosion takes someone dear to Antonia, and she blames Gabriela. Guillén is badly injured. Gabriela returns and gets accused of murdering Tigre.
episodes.title: Acusada

episodes.synopsis: Antonia goes after Gabriela, telling her she’ll take her son away. Gabriela steals a car and leaves desperate to find her son. Alejandro finds her.
episodes.title: Peligrosas Amenazas

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela attacks Alejandro and gets arrested. Ricardo gives Antonia temporary custody of David. Gertrudis tells Antonia Gabriela is pregnant.
episodes.title: Culpable

episodes.synopsis: Francisca and Maximiliano face destitution. At El Paraíso, Alejandro is told Gabriela caused the miscarriage. Gabriela swears vengeance on Antonia.
episodes.title: Golpiza

episodes.synopsis: Gastón sends a letter to Francisca from jail, but Aníbal intercepts the one he sent to Ricardo. Gabriela puts her escape plan in motion.
episodes.title: Escape

episodes.synopsis: A fight between Gabriela and Gertrudis doesn’t end well for Gertrudis. Alejandro keeps drinking. Gabriela thinks Alejandro called the police on her.
episodes.title: Atrapada

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela goes to the hospital and Gertrudis wants her revenge. Antonia tries to win David over. Ricardo and Patricia plan to get married.
episodes.title: Boda a la vista

episodes.synopsis: Prudencia and Julio find out their daughters are getting married pregnant. Aníbal threatens Francisca to get her to authorize mining El Chamuco.
episodes.title: Esperanza perdida

episodes.synopsis: At El Paraíso, Gabriela is a shell of her former self. Gastón is freed and starts investigating the prosecutor who sent him to prison without a trial.
episodes.title: Largo encierro

episodes.synopsis: Lucho and Gastón make friends as they share a jail cell. Ricardo fights with his mother and Antonia. Aníbal orders Gabriela released from solitary.
episodes.title: Casi destruida

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela is catatonic after four years of soul-crushing confinement. Constanza tries to help her. Lucho feigns insanity to get back into the asylum.
episodes.title: De regreso

episodes.synopsis: Constanza fears for her life; the Lobos have already made plans for her along with Gertrudis. Milagros offers to help Gabriela and Constanza.
episodes.title: Aliados

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela and Lucho plan to rush their escape and take Constanza. Maximiliano sneaks into El Paraíso planning to help Gabriela get away.
episodes.title: Represalias

episodes.synopsis: Maximiliano is suffering over Gabriela. Alejandro talks with Ricardo about Constanza. Antonia wants Gabriela dead, and things get hot at the asylum.
episodes.title: Incendio

episodes.synopsis: El Paraíso is still on fire. Gabriela saves Lucho, and they both rescue Constanza. Alejandro decides to go to El Paraíso. Gabriela doesn’t come out.
episodes.title: ¡Libres!

episodes.synopsis: Constanza gets sick, and the Suárezes and Gastón take care of her. She asks Gabriela to swear not to harm Ricardo. Max gets the gold from the tomb.
episodes.title: Reencuentro

episodes.synopsis: David crashes his motorcycle. Gabriela goes to visit him at the hospital dressed as a nurse. Lucho is missing and presumed to have fled.
episodes.title: Riesgos

episodes.synopsis: Antonia orders Gastón arrested. Gabriela realizes that she and Constanza are in danger, and Gastón tries to rescue them in an ambulance.
episodes.title: Fuga

episodes.synopsis: Francisca finds out that Gabriela, Constanza and Lucho have fled. Constanza gets her inheritance and starts planning to fake her death.
episodes.title: Dinero y amor

episodes.synopsis: David returns to San Pedro with Valentina. Antonia thinks this is her chance to get her hands on Valentina’s fortune. Aníbal announces his candidacy.
episodes.title: Transformación

episodes.synopsis: Gabriela and Constanza leave for Mexico to meet with their enemies. Cecilia helps Valentina find Max. They invite Alejandro to welcome Veróncia.
episodes.title: Invitación

episodes.synopsis: David and Max face off. Lucía has a fever and Alejandro takes her to the doctor. Antonia promises she’ll show everyone Verónica is really Gabriela.
episodes.title: ¿Quién es?

episodes.synopsis: Verónica offers Alejandro a job as bank manager. Constanza meets with Ricardo. Gabriela tells Gastón a surprise visitor is on the way.
episodes.title: Parecido

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal doesn’t invite Antonia to Verónica’s dinner. Alejandro catches Valentina kissing Maximiliano. Lucecita talks to Lucho about Julio Montemar.
episodes.title: Pasiones

episodes.synopsis: Verónica suffers David’s harsh words for his mother in silence. Patricia hears Antonia and Aníbal have a son. Verónica goes to the dinner at Aníbal’s.
episodes.title: Primera victoria

episodes.synopsis: Alberto breaks off all ties with Antonia. She shows up at Verónica’s house to declare war. Lucho gets Comadreja to confess to his business dealings.
episodes.title: Guerra es guerra

episodes.synopsis: Lagarto tells Julio and Aníbal that Macario is in jail. Antonia agrees to a truce with Verónica when she finds out Gabriela’s death is confirmed.
episodes.title: Tregua

episodes.synopsis: Antonia finds out she’s about to be the target of a coup. Lucas gets aggressive with Cecilia. Lucho tells Lucecita Prudencia is with the commissioner.
episodes.title: Divide y reinarás

episodes.synopsis: Gastón starts his radio presentations. Lagarto is listening in disbelief when he receives an anonymous letter that leaves him in shock.
episodes.title: Amante al descubierto

episodes.synopsis: Julio tells Antonia and Aníbal he has to take Lagarto out. Alejandro and Irene come in and Julio tells his daughter her mother is a whore.
episodes.title: Escándalo

episodes.synopsis: Prudencia threatens Chacón that she’ll tell everyone in town about the murders and he kicks her out. Verónica calls the Lobos about the hospital.
episodes.title: Humillada

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal, Chacón and Julio plot to get rid of Prudencia; Gertrudis and Lucas help. Alejandro needs a lawyer to invalidate the document Ricardo signed.
episodes.title: Ángel de la muerte

episodes.synopsis: Everyone suspects that something terrible must have happened to Prudencia at the hands of the Lobos. Patricia is sad that no one is at the funeral.
episodes.title: Dolor de hija

episodes.synopsis: Antonia offers Braulio money to close Valentina’s case. Gastón continues reporting on the unpunished crimes. Francisca and Gastón kiss passionately.
episodes.title: Beso de hielo

episodes.synopsis: Valentina breaks up with Maximiliano. Cecilia cries over David’s leaving and begs Valentina to get back together with Max. David refuses to leave.
episodes.title: Tras la vívora

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro fights with Irene. Gertrudis is surprised by Lucas. The pediatrician tells Alejandro he fears that what Lucía has may be very serious.
episodes.title: Malditos celos

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro finds out his daughter’s medical condition is extremely serious. Ramón tells Lucho that he knows who killed Tigre Suárez.
episodes.title: ¡Ayúdame Dios!

episodes.synopsis: Gertrudis tells Verónica she’s escaping because they’re trying to kill her. Antonia and the Lobos can’t find her and they’re starting to worry.
episodes.title: Besos que matan

episodes.synopsis: Lucía gets bad news from the doctor. Ricardo and Alejandro are investigating the case of the El Chamuco mine. Gastón is called as a witness.
episodes.title: Torturan a Gertrudis

episodes.synopsis: Ramón reveals who caused the explosion. Macario and Lucas hear him and tell Antonia. Antonia sends Macario and Lucas to bring her Ramón.
episodes.title: Golpe a golpe

episodes.synopsis: Antonia is still trying to find out who was with Ramón at the bar. David goes to Verónica’s to visit Cecilia. Alejandro tells Verónica he loves her.
episodes.title: Se comprometió

episodes.synopsis: Lucas arrests Alberto under Antonia’s orders and beats him mercilessly. Ricardo is still overwhelmed after his mother’s call. He tells Patricia.
episodes.title: Corazón roto

episodes.synopsis: Maximiliano is detained as a suspect in the assault against Alberto Espino. Aníbal tells Antonia they’re all going to hell for their avarice.
episodes.title: Sospechas que matan

episodes.synopsis: David reconciles with his uncle Max and asks Antonia to use her influence to get his uncle out of jail. Verónica reveals her true identity to Alberto.
episodes.title: íSoy Gabriela!

episodes.synopsis: Verónica promises to help Alberto, but Antonia cuts his air flow, and by the time she and Ricardo come back to take his statement, it may be too late.
episodes.title: Muere maldito

episodes.synopsis: Verónica warns Antonia that she’s about to make a powerful enemy. Irene demands her mother’s inheritance. Verónica announces her wedding.
episodes.title: ¡Te salvare!

episodes.synopsis: Ramón Izquierdo’s body is discovered by a dog. Ricardo finds out that the police are covering up his death. Valentina faints and goes to the hospital.
episodes.title: ¡Dejame en paz!

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo knows Ramón was murdered. Aníbal confronts Ricardo. Antonia tells Valentina she’ll take care of her. Antonia agrees to the partnership.
episodes.title: ¡Te encontré!

episodes.synopsis: Patricia confesses that Ricardo and Alejandro are brothers. Verónica promises Gertrudis Aníbal will pay for what he’s done. Alejandro wants the truth.
episodes.title: Entregó las pruebas

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro interrogates Poncia. Chacón prepares for a showdown. Alejandro asks Antonia if he’s Aníbal’s son. Antonia informs Aníbal of the situation.
episodes.title: Tienes que pagar

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo confronts his father Aníbal. Francisca kicks Gastón out for being with Estrella. Julio Montemar tells Gastón Chacón killed his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Bastardo

episodes.synopsis: Julio dies in his daughter Patricia’s arms, and Verónica knows the Lobos are behind it. Alejandro asks his mother for money to leave town for good.
episodes.title: Se cumple su karma

episodes.synopsis: Antonia meets the new commissioner, who shows her that things are changing in San Pedro del Oro. Macario finds the stables on fire at the ranch.
episodes.title: Bienvenido Comisionado

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro receives a call informing him Antonia’s been arrested. Aníbal demands she be released, but Balmaceda says she’s staying there for the night.
episodes.title: Guerra Presa

episodes.synopsis: Patricia realizes someone is spying on her. David and Alejandro arrive at the fort and tell Verónica they’re there because David wants to propose.
episodes.title: Lujuria y placer

episodes.synopsis: Ricardo tells Inés the truth about his sexuality and his love for Patricia. Gabriela tells Lucho Balmaceda is coming for him. Antonia is afraid.
episodes.title: “No soy gay”

episodes.synopsis: When Irene doesn’t respond, Valentina asks Poncia to call a doctor. Balmaceda tells Aníbal he suspects Chacón may have been hidden on his property.
episodes.title: ¿Segunda oportunidad?

episodes.synopsis: Francisca finds out Gastón was hiding Lucho. Lagarto confronts Rodrigo, and it doesn’t end well for either. Antonia helps rescue Rodrigo.
episodes.title: Esto es amor

episodes.synopsis: Lagarto escapes in Rodrigo’s car. Max is still in jail. Balmaceda is in bad shape. Irene agrees to work with Lucho. Antonia wants Lagarto dead.
episodes.title: El lado suave de la víbora

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal suspects Antonia saved Rodrigo from the attack. She lies and warns him Macario has to find Lagarto to silence him. Rodrigo kisses Antonia.
episodes.title: Aliados

episodes.synopsis: Antonia and Rodrigo’s story together begins with a passionate kiss. Irene refuses to kill Alejandro, but Lucho’s getting in her head.
episodes.title: Al descubierto

episodes.synopsis: Verónica supports Alejandro’s decision to quit. Ricardo manages to free Maximiliano. Chacón refuses to confess. Rodrigo moves in with Antonia.
episodes.title: Celos desbordados

episodes.synopsis: Antonia invites Rodrigo into her room, but he refuses. Maximiliano confronts Francisca and Gastón. Antonia is furious Maximiliano is still free.
episodes.title: En la cueva de la víbora

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro finds out his mother has lost millions on the stock market. Verónica tells Gastón he should run for mayor.
episodes.title: Puro placer

episodes.synopsis: Antonia tells Aníbal she’s not worried about Balmaceda, she’s got him under control. Gastón tells Rodrigo he thinks Antonia ordered the explosion.
episodes.title: La otra Antonia

episodes.synopsis: Chacón is about to be moved to prison. The hospital reopening ceremony begins. Alejandro sees Lucho hiding amongst the guests. Inés visits Ricardo.
episodes.title: Estoy embarazada

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal shouts for someone to stop Lucho. The shouting is heard at the party. Verónica and Alejandro get tense, and Rodrigo and the police chase Lucho.
episodes.title: Más cachos

episodes.synopsis: Verónica and Max accuse Lucas in front of Rodrigo, who asks Verónica if she’s Lucho’s accomplice. She defends Lucho and tells him to watch Antonia.
episodes.title: De la ira nace el amor

episodes.synopsis: Patricia asks Irene if she has a lover. Inés visits Ricardo for an erotic encounter. Francisca agrees to marry Gastón.
episodes.title: La dura verdad

episodes.synopsis: Antonia plans to cause Cecilia an abortion using medications. Maximiliano meets with the prosecutor to present charges against Antonia and Aníbal.
episodes.title: Con ella sí, contigo no

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro gets Gertrudis to talk about Gabriela in the hospital, while Ricardo listens in. Verónica arrives as Gabriela Suárez to see Alejandro.
episodes.title: La loca los delata

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal is stabilized and tells Antonia that Constanza is alive. Cecilia loses the baby and blames Antonia. Antonia hears Valentina is marrying Max.
episodes.title: Se cae la farza

episodes.synopsis: Valentina finds out Gabriela is still alive. Lucho is afraid Alejandro might betray them and tells Constanza. Gastón agrees and tells Gabriela.
episodes.title: Duro de atrapar

episodes.synopsis: At the trial Francisca accuses Antonia and Aníbal of taking her land, and Cecilia and Poncia corroborate. Rodrigo realizes Poncia’s afraid of Antonia.
episodes.title: Otra víctima

episodes.synopsis: Patricia plans to tell Constanza Ricardo has a lover. Verónica nominates Patricia as president of the Club. Max and Valentina are in a car crash.
episodes.title: Trampas

episodes.synopsis: Francisca’s grief over the death of her son transforms into anger. Alejandro has a terrible fight with Antonia. Irene finds out she’s being spied on.
episodes.title: Premonición cumplida

episodes.synopsis: Aníbal demands Rodrigo arrest Gastón. Ricardo and Patricia are called to the fort. At the meeting, Lucho says he thinks they’ve been spied on.
episodes.title: Asesina

episodes.synopsis: Antonia tells David the truth about her past. Eugenia drinks with Lucas and Macario. Francisca cries when she comes home knowing Max won’t be there.
episodes.title: Evidencias

episodes.synopsis: Antonia orders a new job. Verónica wants Gastón protected. Aníbal threatens Rodrigo to leave Chopo alone. Constanza appears to Rodrigo’s surprise.
episodes.title: Hora de justicia

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro is very worried about Lucía’s treatment. Gertrudis confesses to everything she did under the senator’s orders. Gastón manages to escape.
episodes.title: Hacia la redención

episodes.synopsis: Antonia slaps Macario and Lucas for failing to kill Gastón. Aníbal confronts Ricardo, but he can’t take it when Constanza calls him a murderer.
episodes.title: Rechazada

episodes.synopsis: Antonia teams up with Inés to help her get Ricardo. Irene and Poncia help get Lucho into Antonia’s office. Constanza talks with Antona at the club.
episodes.title: Frente a frente

episodes.synopsis: Verónica has a conversation with Lucía. Antonia visits Aníbal and offers to get help, and he signs a check for her. Irene finds out Verónica’s secret.
episodes.title: De nuevo juntos

episodes.synopsis: Gastón tries to convince Lagarto to declare against Antonia. Verónica tells Alejandro about Irene’s confession. Francisca feels pains in her stomach.
episodes.title: Sobre el calbario

episodes.synopsis: A doctor tells Lagarto that his remaining kidney is certain to fail. Verónica celebrates Antonia’s bad fortune with Gastón. Rodrigo and Antonia fight.
episodes.title: Testigo

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro is taken into custody for assaulting Macario. Ricardo suggests he be transferred to a state prison to keep him out of Antonia’s reach.
episodes.title: Pruebas Robadas

episodes.synopsis: Lagarto tells Alejandro that Antonia shot him. Rodrigo investigates Verónica with an FBI agent. Antonia pressures the lawyer into defending her.
episodes.title: Sin testamento

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo knows the truth but he follows along with Verónica. Lagarto tells Alejandro Antonia shot him and he’s going to die. Antonia owns the brothel.
episodes.title: Plan de escape

episodes.synopsis: Antonia threatens to take everything Verónica owns for defamation. Ricardo receives divorce papers from Patricia. A victory celebration is held.
episodes.title: El Juicio

episodes.synopsis: Antonia tells Aníbal she’ll use her money to make people forget about her past and she’ll always be the Boss. Macario gives Antonia an ultimatum.
episodes.title: La bomba estalla

episodes.synopsis: Verónica laughs and cries over the news that she’s pregnant. Francisca is home alone when that pain hits her again. David confronts Verónica.
episodes.title: Víctima y bendición

episodes.synopsis: Verónica tells Constanza she doesn’t want to lose her son. Rodrigo interrogates Aníbal about his past with Antonia. Gastón is worried about Francisca.
episodes.title: De la risa al llanto

episodes.synopsis: Cecilia is raped, and he escapes, but she manages to get a look at his face and recognizes him. Alejandro, Rodrigo and the police look for Cecilia.
episodes.title: Uno más viene en camino

episodes.synopsis: Verónica and Gastón are jumping for joy. Francisca can’t believe the news. Ricardo and Luisa pick up where they left off, and make up for lost time.
episodes.title: Una nueva visión

episodes.synopsis: Antonia turns to Alejandro for help when a strike is declared at the mine. Lucas manages to tell Rodrigo David Beltrán hit him, but not about Macario.
episodes.title: Pasión sin límites

episodes.synopsis: Lucía is released. Alejandro promises the miners El Chamuco will be back in the Suárez’s hands soon. Luisa tells Patricia Ricardo always loved her.
episodes.title: Trampas y mentiras

episodes.synopsis: Antonia calls Alejandro a traitor and confronts Verónica. Lucía is getting worse. At the trial, Aníbal pleads innocence of Constanza’s accusations.
episodes.title: En busca de la verdad

episodes.synopsis: Lucas wakes up from his coma, but he’s in bad shape. Gertrudis takes the stand and confesses that Aníbal paid her to lock Constanza up.
episodes.title: Traidor

episodes.synopsis: González chases after Lucho and fires into the air. Chacón makes more declarations that condemn Aníbal and Antonia. He swears he’ll have his revenge.
episodes.title: Entre lágrimas

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro confronts Antonia and demands she confess to her crimes. Aníbal refuses to declare against her. The truth about the poisoning is discovered.
episodes.title: Cuerpo en prisión

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo kisses Antonia and she asks him to leave with her. Tigre’s lawyer is willing to help them take down Aníbal and Antonia.
episodes.title: Sin tregua

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo tells Antonia not to let them humiliate her, but it doesn’t go well for her at the courtroom. Aníbal calls her a traitor. She needs a way out.
episodes.title: El tribunal

episodes.synopsis: Antonia visits Aníbal in jail and threatens him. He refuses to reveal that Verónica is really Gabriela, to the bitter end. Alejandro escapes.
episodes.title: Implacable

episodes.synopsis: Alejandro can’t reach Rodrigo, so he calls Lucho. Antonia is awaiting news from Macario. Rodrigo tells her Aníbal’s suicide left her more exposed.
episodes.title: Delatada

episodes.synopsis: Antonia asks David to tell Verónica to visit her. Gabriela tells Antonia she knows who she was, and the scene turns very ugly.
episodes.title: Finalmente Detenida

episodes.synopsis: Lagarto threatens Poncia. Antonia puts sleeping pills in González’s food and attacks the other guard in an escape attempt. Verónica has a bad feeling.
episodes.title: Me quiero morir

episodes.synopsis: Antonia gives Gabriela instructions on how she can get David back. Gabriela goes to the mine to confront Antonia. The mine is surrounded by police.
episodes.title: ¡Hasta pronto, patrona!

episodes.synopsis: Antonia threatens Gabriela that she’ll have David killed. The police surround the mine and Antonia is ready to detonate the explosives.
episodes.title: Continúa enfrentamiento
